explains: n. 方便，便利；便利的事物，便利设施；公共厕所
wordGroup: for the convenience of 为了…的方便
for convenience 为了方便起见
at your convenience 在你方便的时候
at your earliest convenience 尽早；得便务请…从速
convenience sampling 便利抽样；方便抽样；任意抽样
at one's convenience 在某人方便之时

sentences.en: They may use a credit card for convenience.
sentences.cn: 他们可以为了方便而使用信用卡。

sentences.en: The hotel combines comfort with convenience.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆既舒适又方便。

sentences.en: Frozen fish is a very healthy convenience food.
sentences.cn: 冻鱼是一种非常健康的方便食品。
